substeps.message: DB Values returned for the query are: OHM-3507, a fentanyl analog that acts an agonist at the mu-opioid receptor,  was under investigation by  Ohmeda Pharmaceutical for the potential treatment of pain [178823]. However,  since the acquisition of Ohmeda in April 1998, by Becton Dickinson [283213], no development has been reported.OHM-3507  produced time- and dose-dependent increases in the latency for monkeys to withdraw their tails from hot water, and its effects were antagonized by naltrexone [284290], [178823].,

substeps.message: DB Values returned for the query are: Merz, following acquisition of the drug from Shionogi Pharma (formerly Sciele Pharma, formerly First Horizon), a subsidiary of Shionogi, has developed and launched an oral liquid formulation of  glycopyrronium bromide (glycopyrrolate; FHPC-02; Cuvposa) for the treatment  of symptoms associated with excessive saliva production in children, including that associated with neurological diseases  such as cerebral palsy [462560], [674230], [1068056], [1119589], [1318115]. In April 2011, the drug was launched in the US [1182322]. In April 2018, the drug was launched in Canada for chronic severe drooling in patients aged 3 to 18 years with neurologic conditions associated with problem drooling [2019198].,

Values returned in the response are: Merz, following acquisition of the drug from Shionogi Pharma (formerly Sciele Pharma, formerly First Horizon), a subsidiary of Shionogi, has developed and launched an oral liquid formulation of  glycopyrronium bromide (glycopyrrolate; FHPC-02; Cuvposa) for the treatment  of symptoms associated with excessive saliva production in children, including that associated with neurological diseases  such as cerebral palsy [462560], [674230], [1068056], [1119589], [1318115]. In April 2011, the drug was launched in the US [1182322]. In April 2018, the drug was launched in Canada for chronic severe drooling in patients aged 3 to 18 years with neurologic conditions associated with problem drooling [2019198].,

substeps.message: DB Values returned for the query are: Ben-Gurion University Of The Negev is investigating a modified version of rituximab, generated by redesigning a portion of rituximab, for the potential treatment of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) [1930835], [1947167]. By  May 2017, preclinical studies had been conducted. At that time, the university was seeking to outlicense the program though its technology  transfer company BGN Technologies   [1930835], [1947167].,

substeps.message: DB Values returned for the query are: Fate Therapeutics and the University of Minnesota are investigating FT-516, comprised of allogeneic NK cells derived from a clonal master induced pluripotent stem cell (iPSC) line engineered to express a novel CD16 Fc receptor (hnCD16-iNK),  for the potential treatment of  hematologic malignancies, including acute myelogenous leukemia (AML), non-Hodgkin's lymphoma (NHL) and multiple myeloma (MM) [1677531], [1913925],  [2117347].    In February 2019, the US FDA approved  an  IND application for FT-516 to initiate a clinical trial  in patients with certain relapsed/refractory hematologic malignancies, including AML, NHL and MM; phase I clinical investigation was expected to begin in mid-2019 [2117347]; in April 2019, this was still the case [2134208].,

Values returned in the response are: Fate Therapeutics and the University of Minnesota are investigating FT-516, comprised of allogeneic NK cells derived from a clonal master induced pluripotent stem cell (iPSC) line engineered to express a novel CD16 Fc receptor (hnCD16-iNK),  for the potential treatment of  hematologic malignancies, including acute myelogenous leukemia (AML), non-Hodgkin's lymphoma (NHL) and multiple myeloma (MM) [1677531], [1913925],  [2117347].    In February 2019, the US FDA approved  an  IND application for FT-516 to initiate a clinical trial  in patients with certain relapsed/refractory hematologic malignancies, including AML, NHL and MM; phase I clinical investigation was expected to begin in mid-2019 [2117347]; in April 2019, this was still the case [2134208].,
